content.description: Your session on PDND Interoperabilità has expired. You are about to be redirected to Self Care

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Insert the reason why you are rejecting the fruition request. Min 20 chars, max 1000 chars.

subtitle.changePlan: By refusing this plan change, the user will still be able to continue using the previously available plan.
subtitle.newPurpose: By rejecting this purpose, the user will not be able to access your e-service data.

infoLabel.changePlan: Enter the reason why you reject the plan change. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters
infoLabel.newPurpose: Enter the reason why you reject the purpose. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

content.subtitle: A more recent version of the e-service <1>{{eservice}}, version {{version}}</1>, provided by {{provider}}, has been published.

description.title: What does it mean?
description.content: When a provider publishes a new version of an e-service, there are variations compared to the previous one. These changes may be administrative, technical, or both. Do you have any doubts? <1>See the guide.</1>

checkboxesForm.title: What is recommended to do before updating?
checkboxesForm.attributesCheckLabel: The administrators verified compliance with the requirements (attributes) requested by the provider.
checkboxesForm.apiIntegrationCheckLabel: The technicians have verified that your integration corresponds to the updated API of the e-service.
checkboxesForm.testEnvCheckLabel: The technicians tested the integration with the updated e-service in a test environment (if available).

content.missingVerifiedOrDeclaredAttributesAlert: The new request will not be active immediately, your organization does not have all the necessary attributes. A draft will be produced which you will be asked to integrate. Once done, you can forward it to the provider to request the update.

upgrade.label: Upgrade
upgrade.notAllCheckboxCheckedTooltip: To be able to update, tick all the checkboxes above

dialogClonePurpose.title: Confirm cloning purpose
dialogClonePurpose.description: A new purpose will be created in draft status with the same characteristics as the one selected. Select the e-service to which to associate it.

certifiedAttributesAlert.title: Non è possibile richiedere la fruizione dell’e-service
certifiedAttributesAlert.description: L'ente selezionato non dispone degli attributi certificati necessari a richiedere la fruizione dell'e-service

dialogDeleteOperator.title: Forwarding to Reserved Area for user removal
dialogDeleteOperator.description: User operations on all products managed by PagoPA take place through the Reserved Area portal. By clicking "confirm", you will be redirected to the Reserved Area page to manage the selected user.

dialogRemoveOperatorFromClient.title: Confirm user removal
dialogRemoveOperatorFromClient.description: By clicking “confirm”, the current user will be removed from the current client and will no longer have access to it. For continuity, all keys uploaded by this user will remain available in the client. For safety reasons, it is recommended to replace them and discard the old ones. Do you have any doubts? <1>Read the guide</1>.

content.description: If you revoke the {{attributeName}} attribute from the {{tenantName}}, it will lose access to all the e-services for which it has an active request for use, immediately interrupting the use of the service.
content.checkbox: I confirm that I understand the consequences of revocation

drawerRejectReason.title: Rejected reason
drawerRejectReason.defaultServiceString:
---

Thank you for your cooperation,

the Interoperabilità Team.
drawerRejectReason.guideLinkLabel: For further doubts and information. Go to the manual.

dialogSetTenantMail.title: Insertion of contact email
dialogSetTenantMail.description: The address entered has no legal value. It will be shown on PDND Interoperability as a reference point to facilitate the direct exchange of information between members (e.g. requests for support and clarification, etc.)

dialogRemoveUserFromKeychain.title: Confirm user removal
dialogRemoveUserFromKeychain.description: The current user will be removed from the current keychain and will no longer have access to it. All keys uploaded by this person will remain available in the keychain. It is recommended to replace them and discard the old ones. To find out more, <1>read the guide</1>

dialogDeleteProducerKeychainKey.title: Confirm public key deletion
dialogDeleteProducerKeychainKey.description: The key can no longer be used to sign responses to users of your e-services. To find out more, <1>read the guide</1>.

content.description: Please remember that it is necessary to have been appointed as Personal Data Controller, by signing the deed required by art. 28 of the GDPR, before starting any processing activity via the infrastructure on behalf of the Delegator, Data Controller.

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason why you refuse the delegation. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

content.description: The delegate will lose management of your e-service {{eserviceName}} with producer delegation, and the agreements and the purposes associated with it. The e-service will return under your control in the state it was in at the time of revocation. Do you have doubts? <1>Read the guide.
content.checkbox: I have read and I want to proceed with the revocation

content.description: By revoking the delegation, you will come into possession of the requests and purposes created by the delegate for use on behalf of your institution and you will be able to manage them independently, or create a new delegation. Do you have doubts? <1>Consult the guide. After revocation, you will have to reactivate and/or create the purposes and associate your clients to be able to access the e-service data again {{eserviceName}} with delegation of use.
content.checkbox: I have read and I want to proceed with the revocation

dialogRejectDelegatedVersionDraft.title: Reject publication
dialogRejectDelegatedVersionDraft.description: The reason for your refusal will be reported to your delegate, who will be able to update the draft and send it back to you for approval for publication.

reason.label: Reason
reason.infoLabel: Enter the reason why you refuse publication. Min 10 characters, max 250 characters

dialogApproveDelegatedVersionDraft.title: Publish version
dialogApproveDelegatedVersionDraft.description: You are about to publish a new version of your e-service {{eserviceName}} with delegation of delivery developed by your delegate {{delegateName}}. At the same time, you approve the risk analyzes compiled by the delegate acting on your behalf.

singleFileInput.dropzoneLabel: Drag here file or click here to select it from your computer

apiInfoSection.title: API Interoperabilità
apiInfoSection.content: Useful parameters to obtain information programmatically through <1>your interop api clients</1>

content.uat: Testing environment. Do not use real data.
content.att: Attestation environment for private entities: be careful, the data does not have to be real

maintenanceBanner.bodySingleDay: Interoperabilità PDND will undergo scheduled maintenance on {{maintenanceStartDay}} at {{maintenanceStartHour}} for approximately {{hoursDuration}} hours. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
maintenanceBanner.bodyMultipleDay: Interoperabilità PDND will undergo scheduled maintenance from {{maintenanceStartHour}} of {{maintenanceStartDay}} to {{maintenanceEndHour}} of {{maintenanceEndDay}}. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

routeLabels.SUBSCRIBE_INTEROP_M2M_CLIENT_KEY_EDIT: Manage Interop API client public key
